original_text: And, behold, there came a man named Jairus, and he was a ruler of the synagogue: and he fell down at Jesus' feet, and besought him that he would come into his house:
korean_text: 이에 회당장인 야이로라 하는 사람이 와서 예수의 발 아래에 엎드려 자기 집에 오시기를 간구하니

sentences.original_text: And, behold, there came a man named Jairus
sentences.korean_translation: 그런데 보라, 야이로라 하는 사람이 와서

sentences.original_text: and he was a ruler of the synagogue
and he fell down at Jesus' feet
and besought him that he would come into his house
